evalEnergy(individual)[source]¶

Evaluation function for the ground-state searching problem.

The problem is to determine a configuration of n vacancies on a crystalline structures such that the energy of crystalline structures can obtain minimum value.

get_epoch(nb_vac)[source]¶

evalEnergy(individual)[source]¶

Evaluation function for the ground-state searching problem.

The problem is to determine a configuration of n vacancies on a crystalline structures such that the energy of crystalline structures can obtain minimum value.

get_ce()[source]¶

Function used to get the CE object contained in HFO2App object :return: CE object

transver_to_struct(element_lis)[source]¶

Function used to transveer list of number to str.out file in ATAT program.

Convert element list to ATAT str.out file :param element_lis: list of number :return: str, filename of ATAT structure file, default str.out
